Barbarian.description: A fierce warrior from the wild lands, drawing strength from primal rage.

Bard.description: A charismatic performer who weaves magic through music and tale.

Cleric.description: A devoted servant of a deity, wielding divine magic and faith.

Druid.description: A guardian of nature who can shapeshift into beasts.

Fighter.description: A master of arms and armor, trained in the art of combat.

Immolator.description: A wielder of elemental fire, burning with destructive power.

Paladin.description: A holy warrior sworn to uphold justice and defend the innocent.

Ranger.description: A skilled tracker and hunter who thrives in the wilderness.

Thief.description: A nimble rogue skilled in stealth, trickery, and trap-finding.

Wizard.description: A master of arcane magic who studies ancient spells and rituals.

Everyone.description: Universal moves available to all characters.
